nodes.text: Come-up flector was a term, possibly originating on Caprioril, for a person who worked starports or other points of debarkation, searching for potential buyers of products or services the buyer did not really need.
Mara Jade posed as such a person under the alias 'Merellis'.
Fleck, a Human male, was the chief come-up flector working for the Krish Gamgalon on Varonat.
